promises.title: End war in Ukraine within 24 hours of being elected
promises.description: Trump claimed he would end the war in Ukraine in 24 hours if he won.
promises.status_info: This promise was marked as broken because it was not fulfilled within 24 hours. It will be marked as compromised when it is executed.

promises.title: Withdraw from the Paris climate agreement
promises.description: Trump promises to pull out of the climate agreement and claw back any unspent or unallocated money.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Laura Trump - Trump is not associated with and doesn't support Project 2025.
promises.description: Laura Trump is saying that Trump doesn't know anything about project 2025 and that he does not support and find many things 'really frightening' about the plan.  Claims associations with Trump and Trumps platform with project 2025 are hoaxes and misinformation.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: No tax on overtime hours
promises.description: Trump has committed to a blanket exemption from income tax for income earned from overtime work.

promises.title: Make government or insurance pay for IVF

promises.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr - Trump asked him to do three things health related
promises.description: Clean up corruption in government health agencies, return those agencies to their rich tradition of gold-standard and evidence based science, and make America healthy again by ending the chronic disease epidemic.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Kash Patel - Mass declassification will occur under Trump
promises.description: This will show people's rights have been violated by FISA warrants and other things being done behind closed doors.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Jim Jordan - Trump will not carry out threats to go after political rivals
promises.description: Trump has repeatedly threatened to carry out various actions against his political rivals and democrats in general.  Jim Jordan has denied this will occur.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Trump won't end the Affordable Care Act
promises.description: Trump posted to Twitter that he will not end the Affordable Care Act when he was accused of intending to do that.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Fire Gary Gensler on Day 1
promises.description: Trump pledged to fire Gary Gensler on day 1 of his administration during the Bitcoin 2024 conference.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Trump will not try to fire Jerome Powell
promises.description: Trump stated in an interview he would not attempt to fire the Chairman of the Federal Reserve Jerome Powell.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: JD Vance - Promises Trump will fire and not hire anyone who doesn't follow Trumps orders
promises.description: Vance said that they will not hire and fire anyone who didn't show loyalty to Donald Trump and follow his orders.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: End birthright citizenship for undocumented immigrants' babies
promises.description: Will sign an executive order on day 1 that future children of illegal immigrants will not be citizens of the United States of America.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Restore and expand the Trump travel ban
promises.description: Trump indicated he would restore and expand the Trump travel ban on Day 1.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Suspend refugee resettlement immediately
promises.description: Stop all migrate flights, end all illegal entries, terminate the phone app CBP One, revoke deportation immunity, suspend refugee resettlement, and return all migrants to their home countries.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Charlie Kirk - If John Thune doesn't support Trump in 30-45 days he'll be removed
promises.description: Kirk stated that they will have John Thune removed if he doesn't support Trump by getting his appointments through the senate.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Charter up to 10 new cities using one half of one percent of federally owned land
promises.description: Get proposals and grant to the top ten proposals to build new cities.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Elon Musk - Trump will veto a national abortion ban
promises.description: Elon Musk states that Donald Trump will veto a national abortion ban if it comes before him.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Trump promises he will not sign a national abortion ban
promises.description: On multiple occasions he has indicated he will not sign a national abortion ban.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Richard Hanania - Trump will not nominate RFK, Elon Musk, or Tulsi Gabbard to cabinet positions
promises.description: On election night Richard Hanania indicated he had only voted for Trump because he didn't believe that Trump would appoint RFK, Elon or Tulsi to positions and that if he knew they would do that he would not vote for Trump.
promises.status_info: Trump has nominated all for various positions but Tulsi and RFK have both been put into cabinet positions while Elon is in charge of a new "Department of Government Efficiency."  He especially calls out RFK as not being put into the exact position he was nominated for.

promises.title: Will inform every college president that, if you do not end antisemitic propaganda, they will lose their accreditation and federal taxpayer support
promises.description: Trump promised to cut federal funding and revoke accreditation for any colleges that do not end the "antisemitic propaganda" on their campuses with the informing them occurring during the first week of the administration.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Order the Department of Defense to use special forces, cyber warfare, and other overt and covert actions to damage cartel leadership, infrastructure and operations.

promises.title: Get the full cooparation of other governments to stop the cartels or "expose all the corruption" that is allowing the cartels to continue operations.

promises.title: Pass legislation that will give drug smugglers and human traffickers the death penalty.

promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Joe Rogan - I will not interview Donald Trump
promises.description: Joe said he would not interview Trump or "help him" on the Lex Friedman podcast.
promises.status_info: He did interview Donald Trump.

promises.title: Howard Lutnick - Trump will not put RFK in charge of HHS
promises.description: Howard Lutnick stated in an interview with Kaitlan Collins that RFK will not be in charge of HHS.
promises.status_info: RFK has been nominated to be in charge of HHS.

promises.title: Mike Pompeo - Trump will not let Putin roll through Ukraine
promises.description: Mike Pompeo says Trump is going to withdraw funding from Ukraine and he is going to find a resolution that will end in peace and the west winning.

promises.title: JD Vance - Trump will strip the security clearances of the 51 intelligence officials who labeled the Hunter Biden laptop "Russian disinformation"

promises.title: Ben Domenech - Matt Gaetz has 30 no votes in the Senate "so I don't think this is going to be a problem"

promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Government Efficiency Commission will have a plan to totally eliminate fraud and improper payments in six months
promises.description: Trump made the promise at the same time he promised to create the commission.
promises.status_info: Trump has started the process of having the commission created that will then create the promised plan.  The announcement was at the Economic Club of New York in September 2024.
